cause.description:
MCFLY NEED TO COME TO THE USA! Mcfly are a Pop/Rock band from the UK. They're from England to be specific. We need to show them how many fans They have that love and support them! We need them here, as soon as possible. The more people in the cause the better! Okay so this isn't really a 'raising money' type cause. BUT WHATEVER GETS MCFLY OUT THERE CAN HELP!
1. They've only been here for JML
2. Not everyone made it to those gigs
3. We miss them, and need them to come
cause.mission: Get Mcfly to come to the USA!
cause.name: BRING MCFLY TO THE USA!
